mean_en: an official document issued by the government of a country that identifies someone as a citizen of that country and that is usually necessary when entering or leaving a country
word_etyma: pass通过+port港口→通过港口的凭证→护照
short_phrase: show my passport at the airport
sentence: I had to show my passport to the immigration official.
sentence_trans: 我必须向移民局官员出示护照。
